parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Opens the [[Diary]] screen on the subject/record specified by link. To get a valid link format, use [[createDiaryLink]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''processDiaryLink''' link

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> link:  [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryLink]] ["Tasks", ([[simpleTasks]] [[player]]) select 0, ""]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Select a task in the Task menu</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>To select various tabs in the map screen:</value></part></template>
[[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryLink]] ["selected_tab", [[player]], ""];
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>... where '''"selected_tab"''' can be '''"Tasks"''', '''"Diary"''', '''"Units"''', '''"Players"''', '''"Statistics"''', other user created subjects</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryRecord]] [[createDiarySubject]] [[diarySubjectExists]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 30, 2017 - 21:49 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">You can also force open diary with selected link by passing string in link format directly:
<code>[[processDiaryLink]] "&lt;log subject=""Diary"">&lt;/log>";</code>
The above will open tab Briefing. 
<code>[[processDiaryLink]] "&lt;log subject=""Diary"" record=""Record2"">&lt;/log>";</code>
The above will open tab Briefing and select 3rd record from the bottom, provided the records were added consistently.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
